title: Can we all just stop copying each other? It's getting kinda sad
body: When you scroll down the boards, its the same thing from a week ago. The number one post in "Hot" Is the same one from like two weeks ago its the same concept "give champions the same amount of health as wards" its like we get it... we all get one shot... or just those basic akali ones. "dont you guys think akali is strong" likee uhhhhh no thats a completely unique idea, where did you think of that one. Get this man a spot on the balancing team.
